body: Im looking to buy a new mouse what do you guys recommend?
body_tagged: Im looking to buy a new mouse what do you guys recommend?
title: what is a good gaming mouse

replies.body: Logitech G500s. Only problem is the existence of a braided cable, but you can't have everything.
replies.body_tagged: Logitech G500s. Only problem is the existence of a braided cable, but you can't have everything.

replies.body: Razor. A bit costly but my babe <3.

replies.body: The Naga is good, though there are actually some pretty good $5 mice that match its abilities to some extent

replies.body: Personally, I use the G700S, and I can't go back to normal wired gaming mice.  However, it's not cheap by any means.
replies.body_tagged: Personally, I use the G700S, and I can't go back to normal wired gaming mice.  However, it's not cheap by any means.

replies.body: I use logitech M210, wireless and only requires one AA battery :D

replies.body:
Honestly, I would recommend saving money :3
This is the mouse I use for pvp and I pvp just fine with it. I got it for $3 off of craigslist <3

replies.body:
If you have the money a razor naga or roccat kone are the best around. 

However the roccat kova is very good, i use it and its pretty cheap. I would greatly recommend it. https://www.google.co.uk/shopping/product/6992429323288690573?q=roccat+kova&rlz=1C1CHFX_en-GBGB565GB... If you want to buy it, line there. More info on it link here. http://www.roccat.org/Products/Gaming-Mice/ROCCAT-Kova/
replies.body_tagged:
If you have the money a razor naga or roccat kone are the best around.

replies.body:
Razer is not perfered for me imo.

I got a razer death adder and there are numerous problems that I had. It's too big for me, the mouse wheel is imprecise, and clicking involves waay to much force.

Just go with something cheap like an Eblue cobra or something
replies.body_tagged:
Razer is not perfered for me imo.

I got a razer death adder and there are numerous problems that I had. It's too big for me, the mouse wheel is imprecise, and clicking involves waay to much force.

Just go with something cheap like an Eblue cobra or something
